casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Iziah BARDEN. No. 96A01-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 24, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Ellen B. Scouten, Special Deputy Attorney General, John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time for Court Reporter to Deliver Transcripts:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 31st day of July 2006 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of April 2006."
